description: Paul`s Metagross was the third Pok√©mon sent out to battle and faced off against Ash`s Gengar during the Training Battle at Oak`s Laboratory. It was meant to emulate Steven Stone`s Metagross in preparation for Ash Ketchum`s entry into the Masters Tournament. It was defeated Ash`s Gengar as it had learned the Fire-type move Will-O-Wisp earlier which was Super Effective against it.
name: Metagross (Shinji)
